ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.gui

Class MediaActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.cmput301f13t13.storyhoard.gui.MediaActivity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditChapterActivity, ViewChapter

    public abstract class MediaActivity
extends Activity
    This activity handles all the media getting and setting code. Although this activity is never called directly, it is the superclass for any activity which handles media.
    Author:
    sgil

      • takePhoto

        public void takePhoto(java.lang.String imageType)
        Code for calling the camera app to take a photo.

        CODE REUSE
        LonelyTweeter Camera Code from Lab
        Author: Joshua Charles
        Campbell License: Unlicense
        Date: Nov. 7, 2013
        Parameters:
        imageType - A string indicating whether the image taken is a "photo" or "illustration".

      • addPhoto

        public void addPhoto()
        Sets up the dialog for taking a photo or browsing the gallery, and also for adding a text comment to the photo. Then calls the either takePhoto() or browseGallery() to actual complete the task of adding a photo to the chapter.

      • insertIntoGallery

        public void insertIntoGallery(Media image)
        Adds an image that was just taken with the camera app into the gallery.
